vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: lastMsg in Log.addMessage (patch_4.sol#43) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.deposit (patch_4.sol#13-18):
	External calls:
	- transferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_4.sol#16)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_4.sol#17)

external-function

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_4.sol#1): it allows old versions
